name: maribel602flores
comment: Beautiful product! Very small. I brought a set for my partner and I for our anniversary in a few weeks.

name: shaquitabeverly
comment: Super cute!!! Great quality and the customer service is amazing. My anklet was accidentally sent in the wrong color but the shop owner immediately sent out the correct order!

name: Autumn McGowan
comment: I ordered this puzzle for Mother's Day abd my mom finally finished it so I wanted to leave a review with the picture! She loved it so much!

name: andressa
comment: The product is beautiful and amazing quality. Have to add that they have the best customer service that I have ever had. Would definitely recommend this to everyone!

name: Marnie S.
comment: Amazing jewellery and fantastic customer service. I Recently lost my dog so thought it would be a nice idea to get a charm for my mum for Christmas with a photograph of my dog.

name: Arlinn p.
comment: Great picture I choose to remember my daughter it is great didnâ€™t take long for shipping either.

comment: I really like it is solidly made and the quality of the picture is great.
